name: Land of Zympaia
description:
In the land of Zympaia, you are thrown into the big wide world as a homeless person without having anything in your hand or pocket. You decide how situations will end for you. Different professions can change your life, so you should consider everything.​

The game is a rolling survival game, they have many options such as craft, fishing, inventory, quest, profession, farm, marriage or even a reputation system. The game is currently in the Alpha and many things are still in the planning stage, e.g. the scenes expansion of other areas.



This is the darkness as we describe it. Darkness fell upon us, dark creatures set whole cities on fire, and there is nothing left but ashes. Time passed but the darkness remained, there are few survivors. Now I'm the one who has to do something about it, otherwise we're all lost.



  • Campaign:
travel through six fantastic landscapes, rebuild your late father's old farm and survive as long as you can.

  • Your adventure:
as a homeless person you won't get much recognition, try everything possible to reach your goal. Make friends with the citizens of the city, work hard on your dream. Fight the darkness to lead a peaceful life again.

  • Living:
at the beginning of your adventure, your sister bought back a small house from the mayor that your father once owned, where you can now settle down. Make new furniture for yourself to make your home better. When you have enough gold, you can enlarge your house and develop it further, in the next stages of development you can change the walls and also the floor.

  • Customize:
in the game you can choose your gender and to make your character look good, you can change your face and/or hair. Enter your birthday and choose your hero name.

  • Concept:
We plan to add new content to Land of Zympaia: new events, new missions, new equipment, but also to improve the game world. The whole game is in real time, that means day and night change or date is identical with real time. you can read on our homepage.
